article:
'Body alignment' is the optimal placement of the body parts so that the
skeletal bones are efficiently used, so the muscles have to do less work for
the same effect.

Pilates is a form of exercise that stresses proper body alignment. Many pains
and problems in the body are associated with long term mis-alignments. These can
happen from bad habits or outside forces such as accidents or sports activities.

A good posture requires good body alignment.
